title: Installation issue: mesa
body:
spack install `texlive` failed:

spack version: `0.15.4-1527-d48b18650`
OS: `CentOS 8.2`
platform: `aarch64`

```
  CC       gallivm/lp_bld_format.lo
  CC       gallivm/lp_bld_format_soa.lo
  CC       gallivm/lp_bld_format_srgb.lo
  CC       gallivm/lp_bld_format_yuv.lo

gallivm/lp_bld_format_srgb.c: In function 'lp_build_linear_to_srgb':
gallivm/lp_bld_format_srgb.c:194:44: warning: implicit declaration of function 'powf' [-Wimplicit-function-declaration]
                                  exp2f_c * powf(coeff_f, 1.0f / exp_f));
                                            ^~~~
gallivm/lp_bld_format_srgb.c:194:44: warning: incompatible implicit declaration of built-in function 'powf'
gallivm/lp_bld_format_srgb.c:194:44: note: include '<math.h>' or provide a declaration of 'powf'
gallivm/lp_bld_format_srgb.c:78:1:
+#include <math.h>

gallivm/lp_bld_format_srgb.c:194:44:
                                  exp2f_c * powf(coeff_f, 1.0f / exp_f));
```
